Title: 720 - Page Rendering
Tip: Only render what the user can see.

Summary.What: Shapes off the screen, small shapes, and detailed shapesin the distance are all good candidates for modified rendering.
Summary.Why: Rendering is an expensive process. Writing code to determine what should be drawn will always pays off.
Summary.How: Characterize the shapes that are in the view before the render to determine the best way to process them.
